data.title: Bloomingburg, New York Population 2024
data.text:
Bloomingburg is a city located in Orange County and Sullivan County New York. Bloomingburg has a 2024 population of 978. Bloomingburg is currently declining at a rate of -0.2% annually and its population has decreased by -0.61% since the most recent census, which recorded a population of 984 in 2020.

The average household income in Bloomingburg is $43,582 with a poverty rate of 58.52% . The median age in Bloomingburg is 15 years: 15.7 years for males, and 13.5 years for females.

Bloomingburg Demographics

According to the most recent ACS, the racial composition of Bloomingburg was:

White : 94.07%

Other race : 5.09%

Two or more races : 0.73%

Native American : 0.1%

Black or African American : 0%

Asian : 0%

Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander : 0%
